title: Aorere: an attempt at change
creator_credit: Zero Sixteen Films and Department of Education, New Zealand
brief_description: The headmaster of Aorere College in South Auckland, New Zealand, believes that the resources of secondary schools should be used more completely. Shows the ways in which other members of the community share the facilities of Aorere College.
creator_credit_for_label: Zero Sixteen Films and Department of Education, New Zealand
